Hotel Portfolio

A collection of images I've taken from my adventures around the world.

No. 7

Casa XVII

My sister Matia & I spent a week in Spain wandering around this gorgeous old little town and it was incredible to be able to call Casa XVII our home base.

 hotel lifestyle

No. 6

Shiraz Riad, Morocco

I had an opportunity to work with this stunning traditional hotel in Marrakech. Honestly, probably one of the most stunning places we visited in Morocco.

 hotel lifestyle

No. 5

Joshua District

The folks at Joshua District invited me to stay at two of their epic shipping container villas on the coast just north west of Canggu to capture some lifestyle photography for them.

 hotel lifestyle
